turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there, I'd like to order a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which Starbuck's location is most convenient for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one of Grand Ave and Golden Springs in Diamond Bar, CA

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: To confirm, the Starbucks you want to order the drink at is the one with the address: 22438 Golden Springs Dr Suite 100, Diamond Bar, CA 91765. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's the one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. What I can order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order one caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are there are special extras you would like to add to the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you ask if they have lactose free milk or a non-dairy option?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They do not have lactose free milk, but they do have almond and coconut milk as options.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, can I substitute almond milk for the milk they put in the macchiato?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Is there anything else you'd like to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd actually like a extra pump of caramel as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Does that complete your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: To confirm, you want a Venti Caramel Macchiato with almond milk and an extra pump of caramel.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Your order has been placed at the Starbucks on Golden Springs in Diamond Bar, CA. You should receive a text confirmation on your phone in a moment. Please show them the receipt upon arrival. Is there anything else I can do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope! That was all. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.
